name: Climate
description:
CLIMATE

climate

/ˈklʌɪmət/

the weather conditions prevailing in an area in general or over a long period.

Did you know that 750 billion tons of ice is melting every year due to global warming?

Yes, that is 24,000 tons of melting water being added to the world's oceans every single second.  When carbon dioxide, air pollutants and greenhouse gases accumulate in the environment, they trap the sun's heat and make the planet warmer.  

Play CLIMATE to escape climate change.

Credits

Models : 5 animated Voxel animals by VoxelGuy.

Music : Chiptuna Sandwich by Breitbarth.

Sound Effects : FREE Casual Game SFX Pack by Dustyroom,

44.1 General Library (Free Sample Pack) by InspectorJ Sound Effects,

Water Splash Pack by Rocklynn Productions.

Font : Luckiest Guy by Astigmatic.
